overview: Charlotte is a small town girl who comes to the big city for a "surprise" visit with her older brother Keith. Unknown to her, Keith is just on his way out of town on an important business trip. Charlotte's left to fend for herself and make friends where she can... And boy, does this girl make friends. Charlotte spreads her southern hospitality like a bee spreads pollen. During her short visit she befriends the doorman, the superintendent, the neighbors, the delivery-boy, Keith's best friend... and in the end even Keith's girlfriend.
title: Girl in 6c
